00020 TEST(BasicTests, GeneratorBasic) {
00021 
00022     //System sys;
00023     //System *sys = new System(44100, 8); 
00024     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00025 
00026     Generator gen1(sys); 
00027 
00028     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getName(), "Generator");
00029 
00030     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.sys_->getSamplingRate(), 44100);
00031 
00032     EXPECT_EQ(sys.use_count(), 2);
00033 
00034 
00035     // try to pass the same object
00036     Generator gen2(sys); 
00037     EXPECT_EQ(gen2.sys_->getSamplingRate(), 44100);
00038 
00039 
00040     // we can find the use count b/c this is a smart pointer!
00041     EXPECT_EQ(sys.use_count(), 3);
00042

00054 TEST(BasicTests, GeneratorUtilityMethods) {
00055 
00056     SystemPtr sys(new System);
00057     GeneratorFactory gf(sys); // one instance
00058 
00059     GeneratorPtr gen1 = gf.create(aw::gNameWaveSine);
00060     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 69, aw::pContextNamePitch);
00061 
00062     // testing an internal method
00063     EXPECT_EQ(gen1->getValueWithContextToFrequency(69, aw::pNameRate, 
00064         gen1->sys_->getSamplingRate()), 440.0);
00065 
00066     // set rate by bpm
00067     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 120, aw::pContextNameBeatsPerMinute);
00068     EXPECT_EQ(gen1->getValueWithContextToPeriodSamples(120, aw::pNameRate, 
00069         gen1->sys_->getSamplingRate()), 22050);
00070     // half the value
00071     EXPECT_EQ(gen1->getValueWithContextToPeriodSamples(30, aw::pNameRate, 
00072         gen1->sys_->getSamplingRate()), 88200);
00073 
00074     EXPECT_EQ(gen1->getValueWithContextToFrequency(30, aw::pNameRate, 
00075         gen1->sys_->getSamplingRate()), 0.5);
00076 
00077     EXPECT_EQ(gen1->getValueWithContextToFrequency(120, aw::pNameRate, 
00078         gen1->sys_->getSamplingRate()), 2);
00079 
00080 
00081 }

00085 TEST(BasicTests, GeneratorSetParameterFunctions) {
00086 
00087 
00088     SystemPtr sys(new System);
00089     GeneratorFactory gf(sys); // one instance
00090 
00091     // with defined strings
00092     std::string pName("rate");
00093     std::string pcName("pitch");
00094     GeneratorPtr gen1 = gf.create("wavesine");
00095     gen1->setParameter(pName, 69, pcName);
00096 
00097 
00098     // with character arrays
00099 
00100     GeneratorPtr gen2 = gf.create("randomuniform");
00101     gen2->setParameter("min", 10, "none");
00102     gen2->setParameter("max", 10, "none");
00103     gen2->setParameter("refresh", 60, "bpm");
00104 
00105     EXPECT_EQ(gen2->getValueAtSample(0), 10);
00106     gen2->setParameter("max", 20, "none");
00107 
00108     // check that values have been set
00109     EXPECT_EQ(gen2->getParameter("max")->getValueAtSample(0), 20);
00110     EXPECT_EQ(gen2->getContext("refresh"), aw::pContextNameBeatsPerMinute);
00111 
00112 
00113 }

00118 TEST(BasicTests, GeneratorReadParameterString) {
00119 
00120 
00121     SystemPtr sys(new System);
00122     GeneratorFactory gf(sys); // one instance
00123 
00124     GeneratorPtr gen1 = gf.create("wavesine");
00125 
00126     // presently need to remove spaces
00127     std::string args1("min{constant{-10}}max{constant{10}}rate{constant{30}}{frequency}");    
00128     //std::string args1("min{-10}max{10}rate{30}{frequency}");
00129 
00130     gen1->readParameterString(args1);
00131 
00132     EXPECT_EQ(gen1->getParameterString(), "WaveSine{rate{Constant{30}}{frequency}minimum{Constant{-10}}maximum{Constant{10}}}");
00133 
00134 
00135     GeneratorPtr gen2 = gf.create("constant{30}");
00136     EXPECT_EQ(gen2->getValueAtSample(0), 30);
00137 
00138 
00139     GeneratorPtr gen3 = gf.create("WaveSine{rate{30}{frequency}minimum{-20}maximum{20}}");
00140     EXPECT_EQ(gen3->getParameter("max")->getValueAtSample(0), 20);
00141     EXPECT_EQ(gen3->getParameter("min")->getValueAtSample(0), -20);
00142     EXPECT_EQ(gen3->getParameter("rate")->getValueAtSample(0), 30);
00143 
00144     EXPECT_EQ(gen3->getParameterString(), "WaveSine{rate{Constant{30}}{frequency}minimum{Constant{-20}}maximum{Constant{20}}}");
00145 
00146     // set compact argument
00147     EXPECT_EQ(gen3->getParameterString(true), "WaveSine{rate{30}{frequency}minimum{-20}maximum{20}}");
00148 
00149 
00150     GeneratorPtr gen4 = gf.create("WaveSine{rate{2000}{frequency}minimum{-1}maximum{1}}");
00151 
00152     EXPECT_EQ(gen4->getParameter("rate")->getValueAtSample(0), 2000);
00153     EXPECT_EQ(gen4->getParameter("min")->getValueAtSample(0), -1);
00154     EXPECT_EQ(gen4->getParameter("max")->getValueAtSample(0), 1);
00155 
00156 }
